mapper.select: SELECT form_subject,form_idx FROM form
SELECT form_idx, form_subject,form_content,form_handler_idx FROM form WHERE form_idx = #{idx}
SELECT dept_idx,dept_name,dept_depth FROM department WHERE dept_depth = 2;

SELECT a.dept_idx,dp.dept_name,e.empl_idx,e.empl_name,p.position_idx,p.position_name,d.duty_idx,d.duty_name from employee e join appointment a on e.appolast_idx = a.appo_idx join position_ p on p.position_idx = a.position_idx join duty d on d.duty_idx = a.duty_idx JOIN department dp on a.dept_idx = dp.dept_idx where a.dept_idx = #{dept_idx} UNION SELECT a.dept_idx,dp.dept_name,e.empl_idx,e.empl_name,p.position_idx,p.position_name,d.duty_idx,d.duty_name from employee e join appointment a on e.appolast_idx = a.appo_idx join position_ p on p.position_idx = a.position_idx join duty d on d.duty_idx = a.duty_idx join department dp on a.dept_idx = dp.dept_idx where a.dept_idx IN (SELECT dept_idx FROM department WHERE dept_high = #{dept_idx});
SELECT form_subject,form_idx FROM form WHERE form_subject LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search_val},'%')
SELECT dept_idx,dept_name,dept_depth,dept_high FROM department WHERE dept_high = #{dept_idx}

SELECT a.dept_idx,dp.dept_name, e.empl_idx,e.empl_name,p.position_idx,p.position_name,d.duty_idx,d.duty_name from employee e join appointment a on e.appolast_idx = a.appo_idx join position_ p on p.position_idx = a.position_idx join duty d on d.duty_idx = a.duty_idx join department dp on dp.dept_idx =a.dept_idx where a.dept_idx = #{team_idx};

SELECT a.dept_idx,dp.dept_name, e.empl_idx,e.empl_name,p.position_idx,p.position_name,d.duty_idx,d.duty_name from employee e join appointment a on e.appolast_idx = a.appo_idx join position_ p on p.position_idx = a.position_idx join duty d on d.duty_idx = a.duty_idx join department dp on dp.dept_idx =a.dept_idx
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM document WHERE doc_empl_idx = #{empl_idx} AND doc_state = #{doc_state}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM approval WHERE appr_receiver_idx = #{empl_idx}

SELECT e.empl_idx,e.empl_name, a.dept_idx,a.position_idx, d.dept_name ,p.position_name from employee e join appointment a on e.appolast_idx = a.appo_idx join position_ p on a.position_idx = p.position_idx join department d on a.dept_idx = d.dept_idx WHERE e.empl_idx = #{empl_idx}

SELECT DISTINCT(a.doc_idx),d.doc_subject,d.doc_state,DATE_FORMAT(d.doc_write_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS write_date,DATE_FORMAT(d.doc_update_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_date,DATE_FORMAT(d.doc_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS end_date,d.form_idx,f.form_subject FROM document d join approval a on d.doc_idx = a.doc_idx join form f on d.form_idx = f.form_idx WHERE doc_empl_idx = #{r_empl_idx} ORDER BY d.doc_write_date DESC

SELECT doc_idx,doc_subject,doc_state,DATE_FORMAT(doc_write_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS write_date,DATE_FORMAT(d.doc_update_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_date,DATE_FORMAT(doc_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS end_date,f.form_idx,f.form_subject FROM document d join form f on d.form_idx = f.form_idx WHERE doc_empl_idx = #{r_empl_idx} AND doc_state in(0,2) ORDER BY d.doc_write_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM approval a WHERE doc_idx = #{doc_idx} AND appr_state = #{approval_state};
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(appr_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS appr_date FROM approval a WHERE doc_idx = #{sent_doc_idx} AND appr_state = #{approval_state} ORDER BY a.appr_order DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT appr_state FROM approval WHERE appr_order = (SELECT max(appr_order) FROM approval WHERE doc_idx = #{sent_doc_idx}) AND doc_idx = #{sent_doc_idx};
SELECT count(appr_read_date) FROM approval WHERE appr_state = 0 AND doc_idx = #{sent_doc_idx} ORDER BY appr_order DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT a.appr_state,a.doc_idx,d.doc_subject,d.doc_state,DATE_FORMAT(a.appr_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS appr_date,DATE_FORMAT(a.appr_read_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS read_date,DATE_FORMAT(d.doc_write_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS write_date,DATE_FORMAT(d.doc_update_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_date,DATE_FORMAT(d.doc_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS end_date,d.form_idx,f.form_subject FROM document d join approval a on d.doc_idx = a.doc_idx join form f on d.form_idx = f.form_idx WHERE a.appr_receiver_idx = #{r_empl_idx} AND a.appr_show = 1 ORDER BY d.doc_write_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE approval SET appr_read_date=#{read_time} WHERE doc_idx = #{doc_idx} AND appr_receiver_idx = #{empl_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT d.doc_idx,d.doc_empl_idx,e.empl_name,dp.dept_name,p.position_name, d.doc_update_date, d.doc_subject,d.doc_content,d.doc_content_sub,DATE_FORMAT(doc_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS doc_end_date FROM document d join employee e on d.doc_empl_idx = e.empl_idx join appointment a on a.appo_idx = e.appolast_idx join department dp on dp.dept_idx = a.dept_idx join position_ p on p.position_idx= a.position_idx WHERE doc_idx = #{doc_idx}

SELECT e.empl_name, dp.dept_name, p.position_name,d.form_idx,f.form_subject, f.form_handler_idx FROM document d join form f on f.form_idx = d.form_idx join employee e on e.empl_idx = f.form_handler_idx join appointment a on a.appo_idx = e.appolast_idx join department dp on dp.dept_idx = a.dept_idx join position_ p on p.position_idx= a.position_idx WHERE doc_idx = #{doc_idx}

SELECT al.appr_order,al.appr_receiver_idx,e.empl_name,dp.dept_name,p.position_name,d.duty_name, al.appr_state,al.appr_reason,al.appr_date FROM approval al join employee e on al.appr_receiver_idx = e.empl_idx join appointment a on a.appo_idx = e.appolast_idx join department dp on dp.dept_idx = a.dept_idx join position_ p on p.position_idx= a.position_idx join duty d on d.duty_idx = a.duty_idx WHERE doc_idx = #{doc_idx}

SELECT e.empl_name, dp.dept_name,p.position_name FROM reference r join employee e on e.empl_idx = r.ref_empl_idx join appointment a on a.appo_idx = e.appolast_idx join department dp on dp.dept_idx = a.dept_idx join position_ p on p.position_idx= a.position_idx WHERE ref_doc_idx = #{doc_idx}
SELECT appr_state FROM approval WHERE doc_idx = #{doc_idx} AND appr_receiver_idx = #{empl_idx};
SELECT file_key FROM document WHERE doc_idx=#{doc_idx}
SELECT * FROM file WHERE file_key = #{file_key}
